name: Mean Finance
introduce: Mean Finance is a Dollar Cost Average (DCA) open protocol that enables users (or dapps) to DCA any ERC20 into any ERC20 with their preferred period frequency, without sacrificing decentralization or giving up personal information to any centralized parties. Dollar-cost averaging is a tool an investor can use to build savings and wealth over a long period while neutralizing the short-term volatility in the market.
